full_summary:
# EP119-240681: Lockers for 19th and 20th Floors (Workspaces) on LEL

## Tender Details

* Solicitation Number: WS4121839959
* Amendment Number: 3
* Publication Date: 2023-08-01
* Tender Closing Date (Submission Deadline): 2023-08-29, 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
* Amendment Date: 2023-08-24

## Contract and Procurement Information

* Expected Contract Start Date: 2023-09-06
* Expected Contract End Date: Not Specified
* Procurement Category: Goods
* Procurement Method: Competitive-Selective Tendering
* Selection Criteria: Lowest Price

## Goods and Specifications

* Goods Category: Accommodation Furniture (UNSPSC 56100000)
* Regions of Delivery: National Capital Region (NCR)

## Contracting Entities

* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting Entity Address
   - Address Line 1: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
   - City: Gatineau
   - Province: Quebec
   - Postal Code: K1A 0S5
   - Country: Canada
* End User Entities: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entities Address (Matches the above Contracting Entity Address)
* Primary Contact:
  - Name: Quan, King (SPAC/PSPC)
  - Email: king.quan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
  - Contact Information: (No phone or fax numbers provided)

## Important Notifications
- A previous instruction regarding response submission deadline closing has been disregarded by the Procurement Entity. All necessary supporting documents, and bid submission must be submitted by 14:00 EDT on August 29th, 2023.
- Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

## Notice Information

- Ariba Discovery Posting URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17041037?extsite=MTcwNDEwMzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17041037?extsite=MTcwNDEwMzdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
